description:
In this course titled 'Learn How To Win Friends And Influence Others' By Pradeep Aggarwal , you will learn -

All of us want to make friends and influence others to make them do what we want them to do. If you tell or order people what to do, they may not listen to you and chances are likely that they may resent you.

This course tells you how to influence others successfully so that they do things that you want them to do.

It is ideal for managers and top level executives as they are required to influence people in the lower levels to complete the tasks and projects.

You will also learn how to instantly relax and anchor confidence in your daily and professional life.

By the end of this course you will be able to influence people and get your work done smoothly . It is also helpful to build prospective clients and achieve your business goals.

Students will also become more confident and adapt relaxation techniques to achieve better results in future for their personal and professional growth.

It is ideal for people who are into sales & marketing and require persuasion skills & convincing power to grow in their field.

This course contains a lot of hypnotic exercises and more than 35 minutes of live video content designed over 6 lectures in English and a bonus E-book.
title: NLP- Learn How To Win Friends And Influence Others
